about_the_game:
This is a game that took 7 years to create and was created by two developers.

“I must find my sister, after all I don’t want to be alone.” Inspired by Japan’s famous stealth action game and the remarkable game phenomenon, Only Up, Paradox Metal takes place in a futuristic world where there are vicious robots at every corner and Kagura’s goal is to find her way past all of them and reunite with her sister, Setsuna!
You will use stealth, weapons and a controlled missile launcher to get your way through each level filled with robots and cameras. Don’t be slow but don’t be hasty either because once the robots discover your whereabouts and attack the game will reset back to Level 1, and all of your progress will be lost.

Controls to for movement and sneaking by:

PC: W - move forward or climb
A - move left
S - move back/retreat
D - move right
F - First Person viewpoint
Other Controls : Arrow keys

Access Your Stash:
Hold 1: Display item menu
Press 1 and D together: Switch items
Hold 2: Display weapons menu
Press 2 and D together: Switch and Equip weapons

Attack Like Your Life Depends on It:
Left Click: Punch if no weapon equipped
Left Click: Shoot if gun is equipped
Spacebar: Squeeze Enemies to death


Oh! And remember you can’t save the game. Good luck!
